td.content: s:patient says she is having symptoms of Heart 11-13 x day, in spite of treatment. pt is a f messenger aged 41 ys. she has a history of smoking describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 3 years in her past o:Height 163 cm, Weight 44.3 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15 a:Tachycardia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed nifedipine - 10 mg daily, and ordered ECG.

td.content: s:a white f messenger aged 43 ys describes recurrent Heart over the past month. o:Height 163 cm, Weight 43.8 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16 a:Tachycardia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.
